title: Eddie Jones urges England to change rugby history by knocking New Zealand off their perch in World Cup semi-final
text:
Eddie Jones believes that his team has an opportunity ‘to change rugby history by knocking New Zealand off their perch,’ in their World Cup semi-final at Yokohama on Saturday. The England head coach has urged his players to embrace the moment by eclipsing the All Blacks as the best team in the world, surpassing the side that has set the benchmark for all other countries over the past decade.

As a former Wallaby head coach, Jones has a long track record of trading blows with New Zealand and knows precisely what it takes to assume that mantle of excellence. Jones says that he knew as...
description: Eddie Jones believes that his team has an opportunity ‘to change rugby history by knocking New Zealand off their perch,’ in their World Cup semi-final at Yokohama on Saturday.
